mapper.select: select id, area_name areaName, area_code areaCode,shelves_name shelvesName , status, create_user createUser, create_time createTime, remarks, from warehouse_area_shelves was left join warehouse_area wa on wa.`id` = was.`area_id` where status = 1 and wa.`id` = #{form.id} order by createTime desc
